title: Angela Rayner – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak’s Wife and Infosys
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Angela Rayner, the Deputy Leader of the Labour Party, on 5 November 2022.
content:
Rishi Sunak’s wife is earning tens of millions from her shares in a company still operating from Moscow.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

His tough talk on Putin’s regime is compromised by private conflict of interest. Why is he still refusing to answer questions about Infosys?
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
